message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9,000. I think this is a great price considering the value it brings to your business.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $9,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand your concerns, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $8,750. This is the best price I can offer, considering the value the product brings to your business.
